channel.title: Verify Kubernetes Cluster metrics :: Splunk Observability Cloud Workshops
channel.description: Once the installation has been completed, you can log in to Splunk Observability Cloud and verify that the metrics are flowing in from your Kubernetes cluster. From the left-hand menu click on Infrastructure and select Kubernetes, then select the Kubernetes nodes pane. Once you are in the Kubernetes nodes view, change the Time filter from -4h to the last 15 minutes (-15m) to focus on the latest data.

item.title: Verify the PetClinic Website
item.description: To test the application you need to obtain the public IP address of the instance you are running on. You can do this by running the following command: curl http://ifconfig.me You can validate if the application is running by visiting http://<IP_ADDRESS>:81 (replace <IP_ADDRESS> with the IP address you obtained above). You should see the PetClinic application running.
